questions: Explain the three-way handshake process in TCP and why it's necessary for establishing a reliable connection. Detail a scenario where the handshake might fail and how the system would handle it.
Describe the differences between TCP and UDP protocols. Provide use-case examples where you would choose one over the other and explain your reasoning.
